Class DataObject

Semantic data about an object in a DataModel.

See Data for usage examples.

Summary
  • Contained in a DataModel
  • Stored by DataModel.id in DataModel.objects and Data.objects
  • Created with DataModel.createObject or DataObject.createObject

Readonly id

id: string
  • Defined in packages/viewer/src/viewer/data/DataObject.ts:28

Globally-unique ID.

DataObject instances are registered by this ID in Data.objects and DataModel.objects.

Readonly objects

objects: DataObject[]
  • Defined in packages/viewer/src/viewer/data/DataObject.ts:62

Child DataObject instances within the structure hierarchy.

Undefined when there are no children.

Optional Readonly originalSystemId

originalSystemId: string
  • Defined in packages/viewer/src/viewer/data/DataObject.ts:33

ID of the corresponding object within the originating system, if any.

Optional parent

parent: DataObject
  • Defined in packages/viewer/src/viewer/data/DataObject.ts:55

The parent DataObject within the structure hierarchy.

Undefined when this is the root of its structure.
